citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15 PM on
10/31/23.
The inspector arrived at 2:15 PM on 10/31/23 to conduct an inspection. The inspector tried to contact the Licensee by
phone, text message, and email. The inspector waited for a response and left the premises at 3 PM. An AWA compliance
inspection could not be conducted because there was no other facility representative available to accompany the
inspector.
Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST
attempted inspection of the Licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15 PM on 
10/31/23.  
 
The inspector arrived at 2:15 PM on 10/31/23 to conduct an inspection. The inspector tried to contact the Licensee by 
phone, text message, and email. The inspector waited for a response and left the premises at 3 PM. An AWA compliance 
inspection could not be conducted because there was no other facility representative available to accompany the 
inspector.  
 
Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST 
attempted inspection of the Licensee. 
 
 
End Section
